text: @realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods Why are you sugar coating COVID19? Is it because you want the older population who’s collecting SS/ retirement/ pension  -to lose their lives today we are at 3,150,000 tested positive. I pray you don’t get a 2nd term. I pray that you will get what you deserve.  Mr. Corrupt of USA
